content.en: Efficient power calculations: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve power flow calculations and load flow calculations in distribution systems. They have developed various algorithms that offer new techniques and methods to simplify and make these calculations more efficient. These algorithms take advantage of the structure and topology of the distribution networks, and some even eliminate the need for certain complex calculations, resulting in faster and more accurate results.
content.da: Effektive effektberegninger: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre effekt- og laststrømsberegninger i distributionssystemer. De har udviklet forskellige algoritmer, der tilbyder nye teknikker og metoder til at forenkle og gøre disse beregninger mere effektive. Disse algoritmer udnytter distributionernes struktur og topologi, og nogle eliminerer endda behovet for visse komplekse beregninger, hvilket resulterer i hurtigere og mere præcise resultater.
